city.name: Huangshan
city.platformsDescr: Huangshan has several viewing platforms offering breathtaking views of mountain peaks, clouds, and sunrises/sunsets. Notable platforms include those at "Left Ear Peak" and "Right Ear Peak."
city.cloudsDescr: Huangshan is known for its "sea of clouds," where clouds envelop the mountains, creating fantastic vistas. The best spots for cloud viewing are Lotus Peak and the Peak of Death.
city.springsDescr: The Huangshan Mountains have several hot springs where you can relax and enjoy natural thermal waters. It’s a great place to unwind after long hikes.
city.tangxiDescr: Located near Huangshan, this historical town offers a glimpse into ancient China and traditional architectural styles.
city.lakeDescr: A small lake in the Huangshan Mountains with picturesque views and a peaceful atmosphere, perfect for relaxation.
city.workshopsDescr: The museum showcases a rich collection of ancient ceramics, including famous Sichuan ceramics.
